radiographic_examinations.findings: 2.5 cm opacity projected over the distal trachea on the frontal view; the lateral view was unremarkable.

Lobulated transmural solid mass involving the distal anterior tracheal wall 1.5 cm proximal to the carina; 3.2 cm extraluminal pretracheal component that was coarsely calcified; 2.2 cm endobronchial component predominantly exhibited soft tissue density with a thin rim of calcification at its interface with the distal anterior tracheal wall; near-total occlusion of the distal trachea.
